name: Playing Dead
description:
Play as Jermy the Opossum and battle your way through three challenging levels crossing the ethereal planes. Attacking stresses Jermy out, and Jermy responds to stress by playing dead, which awakens his ghost form. In ghost form, you can't attack so eat some ghost trash to calm your nerves and continue to battle. 

Controls: 

WASD - movement 

Left click - attack 

Space - dash
